ABOUTME.NAME: About Me
ABOUTME.DESCRIPTION: I am a dedicated frontend engineer focused on creating modern, responsive and user-friendly web applications. With curiosity for new technologies, I continuously improve my skills.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.LEARNINGNEXT: I enjoy exploring new technologies, building creative solutions and continuously improving – that’s what makes this career exciting for me.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: Join is a web-based Kanban board I developed together with a team. It enables task management, prioritization and efficient teamwork – inspired by tools like Trello.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: My workflow
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: I organized my tasks into planning, coding and testing. Using Kanban boards, Git workflows and regular reviews helped me stay structured even during busy times.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: What I learned
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: Collaborating with my team was very enriching. I learned to take responsibility, communicate clearly and stay flexible – both technically and organizationally.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: This game was built with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript, focusing on animations and smooth gameplay.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: Implementation
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: My 2D game offers a dynamic experience with boss fights, detailed animations and a solid level structure.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: My learnings
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: This project gave me a lot of insights and showed how versatile HTML, CSS and JavaScript can be in web development.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: A new project is currently in development. Stay tuned – it will be worth it!

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: Info
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter to not miss the launch.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: Thanks
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: Thanks for your patience and interest.

DESCRIPTIONONE.HEADLINE: About this project
DESCRIPTIONONE.TEXT: We are finalizing the details to go live soon.

DESCRIPTIONTWO.HEADLINE: How I worked
DESCRIPTIONTWO.TEXT: Check back soon or subscribe to the newsletter to stay up to date.

DESCRIPTIONTHREE.HEADLINE: Looking forward
DESCRIPTIONTHREE.TEXT: I am excited to share more very soon!

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I am excited to take part in impactful projects. Reach out if you are looking for reliable support in web development or want to bring new ideas to life!
CONTACT.NAME: Your name

PRIVACY.TITLE: Legal Notice
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT_1: No personal data is stored or analyzed when visiting this website. No cookies or tracking are used.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_1: If you contact me via the contact form, the provided data (e.g. name, email, message) will only be used to process your request.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_2: Processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR).
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_3: Your data will not be shared and will be deleted after handling your request.
PRIVACY.LOG_FILES_TEXT_1: The server automatically stores technical details with each request:
PRIVACY.LOG_FILES_TEXT_2: These logs are only used for error analysis and are not linked with other data.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_INTRO: According to GDPR, you have the following rights:
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_CONTACT: To exercise your rights, please contact:
PRIVACY.REVOCATION_TEXT: You can withdraw your consent at any time. Please send an email to
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: This website uses HTTPS encryption. Your data will be transmitted securely when sending the contact form.
PRIVACY.HOSTING_TEXT: The website is hosted on a private server in Germany and fully managed by Marcel Reyes Langenhorst.
